DOC.criteria: Male ≥ 60 ≤ 90 year age . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 20.0 , < 35.0 . Ability climb flight 10 stair walk equivalent city block without help within 3 month prior enrollment . Refrain take dose NSAIDs acetaminophen day 24 hour prior Visit 2 Visit 3 . Refrain use pulmonary maintenance medication day Visit 2 Visit Refrain intense physical activity visit . Systemic corticosteroid within 3 month prior enrollment . Blood thinner anticoagulant medication within 1 week prior enrollment . Glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) < 40 mL/min/1.73m2 . Antibiotics within 1 week prior enrollment . Major surgery le 3 month prior enrollment study . Active malignant disease treat within last 6 month cancer . Immunodeficiency disorder . Diabetes Myocardial infarction 3 month prior enrollment . Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease History allergy ingredient study product . Conditions preclude ingestion absorption study product , inflammatory bowel disease , short bowel syndrome , major gastrointestinal disease . Dementia , brain metastasis , eat disorder , history significant neurological psychiatric disorder , psychological condition . Pursuing weight loss weight gain . Medications/dietary supplements/substances could modulate metabolism weight .
